body:
Comment 4: 
@simonedichiara, thank you for your input.

@minux.ma, another solution is to stay with English. That was the reason for your
change. Russ said (https://golang.org/issue/1834?c=1):

" ... It would be nice if we got the English text all the time on Windows, to match the
behavior on other systems. ..."

Also, I undestand your reasoning - "...to avoid outputting multibyte CJK characters to
the console...".

We could just say:

Windows retuned error #2

instead of more confusing

error 2 (FormatMessage failed with err=15100)

Lets wait for others before we decide.

Alex
